message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!

This is my last chance, I need to get a good deal or I'll be left with nothing!

I'm running out of time, I'll take whatever I can get, but this is my final offer!

I'm out of options, I'll take whatever's left, but I'm not happy about it!
